00033 void KSubRecord::Clear(Option_t *opt)
00034 {
00035         //Clear the base classes and then clear/delete any local
00036         //members. Its necessary for this Clear method to exist
00037         //in the case that instances of this object are stored
00038         //inside of a TClonesArray
00039         TObject::Clear(opt);
00040         
00041         //Clear and delete local objects here. 
00042         
00043         //Re initialize local members here and prepare for the next use of this class.
00044   InitializeMembers();
00045 }

00051 }
